Reviews.Title: “Great location, worth the money”
Reviews.Author: Alecko
Reviews.Content: regular visitors istanbul normally stay sultanahmet district decided time try galata galata antique hotel obvious choice close proximity galata tower werent disappointed particularly view reasonable price paid delux twin nights actual spotlessly clean elegant marble bathroom provided essentials hotel period charm built private home 1880s occasional quirks oddities floor modernised stay didnt affect visit noise dust evident top floor breakfast offers pleasant views buffet breakfast pretty decent staff helpful front desk guys especially willing provide local information maps advice definitely recommend hotel planning base yourself galata reasonably priced spotlessly clean stay close ie tourist orientated shopping short hop tram foot taxim square lots friendly restaurants little crowded main tourist traps sultanahmet
